# {{<bi info-circle>}} rtug::25.1

R-Trento Users Group, year 2025, meeting 1 (that's it)

# {{< bi list-task >}} Today's agenda

- Welcome (that's me)
- RTUG: what is it?
- Seminars
- Refreshments and networking!


## {{< bi question-circle >}} RTUG: what is it?

:::{.columns}
:::{.column width="66%"}
* We are an informal group of R users and developers based in Trento or connected with this territory, in any way
* Activities are funded by the [R-Consortium](https://r-consortium.org)
* Meetings are published on [Meetup](https://www.meetup.com/r-trento-users-group/)
* We aim at **two meetings per year** (minimum)
* Meetings are open to **your** contributions too!
* Our website, [rtug.unitn.it](https://rtug.unitn.it), is also open to contributed posts

:::

:::{.column width="34%"}
![[bit.ly/RTUG](https://bit.ly/RTUG)](/images/bit.ly_RTUG.svg)
:::
:::

5. Spatial Sampling in R (*M. M. Dickson*)
6. E-Agle Trento Racing Team: reporting racecar test results with RStudio (*E-Agle TRT*)
